entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has to get to Dumbledore and catch Snape. He is described as having a heart that is torn with fear.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person whom Harry needs to reach. His death is mentioned as something that cannot happen.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is someone who Harry has to catch. He is linked with Dumbledore in some way.

relationships.description: Harry needs to get to Dumbledore, indicating a goal or objective for Harry.
Harry has to catch Snape, showing that Snape is a target or someone whom Harry needs to apprehend.
